summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2941 for the improvement of 29th Avenue and 29th Avenue North, from East John Street to East Union Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 35548, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
